—Kerren of the Mausoleum Guards

"Is this twisted ceremony simply a mockery of the human rite, or has Olivia fallen for her own charade?"
—Sorin Markov

DBL.flavor: With the cycles of day and night unspooled, the twisted sway of the moon only grew. And grew.

DBL.flavor: "We survived the Travails! Killer angels! Horrors from beyond the moon! Now some big werewolves think they can scare us? Let 'em try."

• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

Flying
